amendment.description: To restrict funding for the approval for human consumption of meat produced from downed animals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2088 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2088 proposed by Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S13997-13998, S14000; text: CR S13998) To restrict funding for the approval for human consumption of meat produced from downed animals.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2088 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2088 proposed by Senator Akaka.
